bill_title: to authorize certain disciplinary action for students riding school buses.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize certain disciplinary action for students riding school buses. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 13-32 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any school superintendent, principal, supervisor, teacher, or bus driver may, for disciplinary reasons, prohibit a student from riding a school bus to and from school premises or to and from school-sponsored activities. No student who is prohibited from riding a school bus pursuant to this Act is entitled to any allowance in lieu of transportation under chapter 13-30 or any other provision of law. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
